title: In pursuit of the possible
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Forums (Discussion and debate)
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Antinuclear movement
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Forums (Discussion and debate)
description: Episode of Series "Hypothetical (Television Program)". Moderated by Geoffrey Robertson, this program examines, by means of hypothetical situations, the role that Australia can play in meeting the challenges posed by disarmament and arms control. The program has been divided into three parts to facilitate its use by community and educational groups and to permit discussion of the various issues as they arise.
